content: my winter sky hat pattern is available in sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months small child 3-5 years child 6-10 years teen adult medium and adult large this textured crochet hat is worked from the bottom-up in one-piece the adult medium hat needs less than 1 skein of yarn the finished hat is soft cozy and comfortable to wear the crown of the hat is fitted to the head so there is not a lot of extra material you can wear it with or without a pompom as it closes up neatly i designed this hat to reach between mid-ear and the base of your earlobe it fits like a cozy beanie but if you d like to make it a slouch hat instead it is simple to do get last week s scarf crochet pattern that uses that matches this hat for free here winter sky scarf pattern 1 > this
